MockupDB
========

.. image:: _static/mask.jpg

Mock server for testing MongoDB clients and creating `MongoDB Wire Protocol`_
servers.

The :doc:`tutorial` is the primary documentation.

Contents:

   :maxdepth: 1

   installation
   tutorial
   reference
   contributing
   authors
   changelog
